verses.text: Do we \w begin|strong="G0756"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* to \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*? \w or|strong="G1487"\w* need \w we|strong="G5535"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \add others\add*, \w epistles|strong="G1992"\w* of \w commendation|strong="G4956"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \add letters\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w commendation|strong="G4956"\w* from \w you|strong="G5216"\w*?

\w Ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w* \w written|strong="G1449"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*:

\add Forasmuch as ye are\add* \w manifestly|strong="G5319"\w* \w declared|strong="G3754"\w* to \w be|strong="G2075"\w* the \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w written|strong="G1449"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* with \w ink|strong="G3188"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* with the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w tables|strong="G4109"\w* of \w stone|strong="G3035"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w fleshy|strong="G4560"\w* \w tables|strong="G4109"\w* of the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w trust|strong="G4006"\w* have \w we|strong="G2192"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God-ward|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w sufficient|strong="G2425"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* to \w think|strong="G3049"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w sufficiency|strong="G2426"\w* \add is\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w made|strong="G2427"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* able \w ministers|strong="G1249"\w* of the \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w testament|strong="G1242"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* of the \w letter|strong="G1121"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* of the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w letter|strong="G1121"\w* \w killeth|strong="G0615"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* giveth \w life|strong="G2227"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w ministration|strong="G1248"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w written|strong="G1121"\w* \add and\add* \w engraven|strong="G1795"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w*, \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w*, so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* stedfastly \w behold|strong="G0816"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w* of \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w countenance|strong="G4383"\w*; \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \add glory\add* was to be done \w away|strong="G2673"\w*:

\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w shall|strong="G2071"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* the \w ministration|strong="G1248"\w* of the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w ministration|strong="G1248"\w* of \w condemnation|strong="G2633"\w* \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w doth|strong="G4052"\w* the \w ministration|strong="G1248"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w exceed|strong="G4052"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was made \w glorious|strong="G1392"\w* \w had|strong="G1392"\w* \w no|strong="G3761"\w* \w glory|strong="G1392"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w respect|strong="G3313"\w*, by reason \w of|strong="G1752"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w excelleth|strong="G5235"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is done \w away|strong="G2673"\w* \add was\add* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w remaineth|strong="G3306"\w* \add is\add* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w*.

Seeing \w then|strong="G3767"\w* that we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, we \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* plainness of \w speech|strong="G3954"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G2509"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \add which\add* \w put|strong="G5087"\w* a \w vail|strong="G2571"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w*, \w that|strong="G4314"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w could|strong="G0816"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* stedfastly \w look|strong="G0816"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w* of that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w abolished|strong="G2673"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w minds|strong="G3540"\w* were \w blinded|strong="G4456"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w remaineth|strong="G3306"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w vail|strong="G2571"\w* untaken \w away|strong="G0343"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w reading|strong="G0320"\w* of the \w old|strong="G3820"\w* \w testament|strong="G1242"\w*; \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \add vail\add* is done \w away|strong="G2673"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* even \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w*, \w when|strong="G2259"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* is \w read|strong="G0314"\w*, the \w vail|strong="G2571"\w* \w is|strong="G2749"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G2259"\w* it shall \w turn|strong="G1994"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, the \w vail|strong="G2571"\w* shall be taken \w away|strong="G4014"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* that \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add*, \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \add is\add* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w with|strong="G4383"\w* \w open|strong="G0343"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* beholding as in a \w glass|strong="G2734"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, are \w changed|strong="G3339"\w* into the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \add even\add* \w as|strong="G2509"\w* by the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
